job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Designing, developing, modifying, and maintaining NX CAM software.
     * Conducting research, design, prototyping, and other exploratory activities.
     * Creating and testing feature components as well as ensuring software quality through unit and system-level testing.
     * Collaborating with and supporting the Product Owner in building and refining user stories and acceptance tests.
     * Utilising paired programming and other practices for frequent code review.
     * Maintaining continuous communication to set shared expectations and fostering a transparent and safe environment.
     * Applying best practices in coding, design, and implementation to build high-quality components and solutions.
     * Leveraging team expertise while sharing knowledge for the team's future benefit.
job_details.full_text:
C++ Software Engineer - Automation & AI

* Designing, developing, modifying, and maintaining NX CAM software.
     * Conducting research, design, prototyping, and other exploratory activities.
     * Creating and testing feature components as well as ensuring software quality through unit and system-level testing.
     * Collaborating with and supporting the Product Owner in building and refining user stories and acceptance tests.
     * Utilising paired programming and other practices for frequent code review.
     * Maintaining continuous communication to set shared expectations and fostering a transparent and safe environment.
     * Applying best practices in coding, design, and implementation to build high-quality components and solutions.
     * Leveraging team expertise while sharing knowledge for the team's future benefit.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional C++ software engineering and NX CAM software development. While 'AI' is mentioned in the title, the core responsibilities do not involve building, fine-tuning, or deploying AI models, nor do they align with the typical tasks of an ML or GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.phrase: Designing, developing, modifying, and maintaining NX CAM software.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the creation and upkeep of software, which falls under the umbrella of Software Development.

job_tasks.phrase: Creating and testing feature components as well as ensuring software quality through unit and system-level testing.
job_tasks.justification: This involves the practical implementation and quality assurance of software components, a core aspect of Software Development.

job_tasks.phrase: Applying best practices in coding, design, and implementation to build high-quality components and solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the engineering principles and practices used in building software, fitting the Software Development category.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborating with and supporting the Product Owner in building and refining user stories and acceptance tests.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates interaction with product management to define requirements and scope, aligning with understanding business needs and translating them.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborating with and supporting the Product Owner in building and refining user stories and acceptance tests.
job_tasks.justification: This involves working with another role (Product Owner) to define project scope and requirements, demonstrating collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: Utilising paired programming and other practices for frequent code review.
job_tasks.justification: Paired programming and code reviews are direct examples of collaborative development practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Maintaining continuous communication to set shared expectations and fostering a transparent and safe environment.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions communication and fostering a positive team environment, key aspects of collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: Leveraging team expertise while sharing knowledge for the team's future benefit.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of acquiring and disseminating knowledge within a team, indicating a focus on learning and knowledge sharing.

job_tasks.phrase: Conducting research, design, prototyping, and other exploratory activities.
job_tasks.justification: While research and design can precede development, in this context, it's tied to creating software components and prototypes, fitting within the broader software development lifecycle.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborating with and supporting the Product Owner in building and refining user stories and acceptance tests.
Utilising paired programming and other practices for frequent code review.
Maintaining continuous communication to set shared expectations and fostering a transparent and safe environment.
Leveraging team expertise while sharing knowledge for the team's future benefit.
